website_summaries.verdict: A 6-seat folding sideline bench that can be set up in just seconds.
pros: Bench is sturdy enough for both adults and children
Offers a great option for outdoor events year-round
Comes with a convenient carrying bag that allows you to easily pack up the bench and take it with you on the go
cons: Less durable than many comparable benches

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and portable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as a bench for an 8U soccer team when we played at fields without benches. Worked perfect for the whole season and held up great. Should be good for years to come. Also sturdy enough for coaches to sit on with players. One of us was was north of 200 pounds so it definitely can take some weight. Set up and tear down are super easy and quick. Nice carry bag to put it in for lugging to and from field. One of my friends bought the same one after seeing mine to use when camping around the fires at night. Works great for that too.
customer_reviews.author: DonkeyChewingAWaffle

customer_reviews.title: Every sports coach that knows what it is like to not have a bench needs one of these. They'd make a great Coach Gift.
customer_reviews.text: HOLY MOLY this was a butt-saver-- literally. My daughter's team played a tournament in Oklahoma, and the fields didn't have a bench for the team's players. Luckily we had this with us. Otherwise, my daughter and her white shorts would've been sitting on wet grass before trying to play soccer in the mud. Sturdy. Held up to 6 players that are about 100lbs each and a grown adult at 120lbs at one time. Plenty of space to put sports bags underneath, and they didn't fly over like the expandable benches with the backs. The pack folds up super easy- one person can handle set up and closing it down. The carrying case holds like a foldable chair.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Hill's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Sent Back the First One
customer_reviews.text: The first bench I received arrived damaged, and I had to send back for an exchange. It's okay for the price, but not sturdy at all. I have another bench which is a Travelchair Travelbench. The Travelbench is way better than this one. Spend the extra money and order the Travelbench, it will save you the trouble of returning. And no I don't work for Travelbench, I just like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: jcm217

customer_reviews.title: Great for team events
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the cross country team. We bought 3 sets. They set up quickly and allow several runners to sit out of the mud. They fold back up quickly too and are easy to carry. They do go in the bags sideways, which is a little different, but manageable. They have carry straps that you can put over your shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to use. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping the kids on the bench focused on the game. Adds some formality and structure to the sideline when there is no bench available. Super light and easy to fold up and deploy. But not so light that it is easily broken. Survived pretty well through the first season. After I started using this, about 10 other coaches started showing up with their own.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our travel soccer team. Some tournaments we play in they did not have benches for the teams, and this folds up easily and has been with us at every tournament (for 4 months). Still functions like new. We bring it to block parties for extra seating and parades in town for easy pop up seating for multiple people. Much easier than hauling 6 folding chairs. We like it with no back because you could face opposite directions when sitting in larger groups.
customer_reviews.author: CLN

customer_reviews.title: Best Value Soccer Bench
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for 3 weeks but it's being used for three different team (2nd grade, 5th grade and 6th grade). Seems very sturdy and other coaches have asked where I got it. I prefer the No Back option b/c the kids don't slouch when they are waiting to go back into the game. We'll see how it stands up for the rest of the fall season and then the spring season...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly assembled; had to return
customer_reviews.text: Bench arrived and wouldn’t open all the way because one of the fasteners was in the wrong spot. One portion of the bench was so taut that that section couldn’t open, which stopped all the other sections from opening. Of course the next one over was so loose that it didn’t stretch properly and was like sitting in a hole. Spend the extra and buy from a reputable manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Paige E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this seat for my granddaughter's basketball team
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this seat for my granddaughters basketball team for the players that were not playing at the time they didn't have individual seats so this works beautifully at the time it's also very easy to transport fold and unfold
customer_reviews.author: Tammy, Sewell, NJ 08080

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe the value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 years ago. We use it for the beach, at church, at the park etc It has held up ALL these years! Best investment I've purchased! Can't believe what we got for the price. We are a large family, and this is a necessity.
customer_reviews.author: Anela

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any coach!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our soccer team! They fold out super easy and close up just as easily. 1 person to set up and put away. We also used it while camping with 8 toddlers and it made corralling the littles for snack time and entertainment quite easy! It was also used during a garage sale to hold merchandise. I highly recommend this seat to any coach or parent of multiples! The carrying bag is VERY convenient too!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: soccer team bench
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my son's soccer team at games so they don't have to sit on the grass. I bought the chair with he back but the kids pulled on it and ripped the back off so I decided to get this one and its perfect for the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Matassa

customer_reviews.title: Must have for sidelines
customer_reviews.text: We use this bench for our 3 soccer teams and love having a spot for players that are waiting to go into the game to sit. One less thing for coaches to worry about. We've used it for ages 6-12yr olds
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Tiny Soccer Crew
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help with keeping my young soccer team together while they are waiting for their turn to take the field. Before they would sit with their parents, get comfortable and not want to play. This helps them stay together as a team and they love it. It was a great purchase and I am very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Folds up small and it durable
customer_reviews.text: I use this for the team of 8 year olds I coach, and so far it has held up very well through one season. It opens and closes quickly and stores easily in the bag. When it's stored in the bag it's small enough to carry around on one should with a soccer bag on the other
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy set of chairs! We use it as the kids soccer games either for the players or for the family. We coach one team so the players of that team use it during those games to keep them all together. For our older son whom we don't coach, our big family (6 kids) can all fit on this one bench/chair, so much easier than hauling in chairs for everyone! The only downside is that it's not super comfy for my adult sized behind, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE!  GREAT PRICE!  EXTREMELY WELL BUILT!
customer_reviews.text: Have kids? Buy this. Family outings, tailgating, camping, soccer games, outdoor movie nights, birthday parties, etc. buy this. I am a professional face painter and this is a saving grace! Kids automatically seem more relaxed and patient. Buy this, I will be ordering another definitly.
customer_reviews.author: Marietta Cappelletti

customer_reviews.title: ... be to add shoulder strap to carry this more easily. It is not really light enough
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I'd change would be to add shoulder strap to carry this more easily. It is not really light enough, or small enough, to carry like a briefcase, but that's how the handles are attached. The bag is sturdy and has room enough to fit a single soccer ball in it, with the bench. Overall very satisfied after a youth soccer season.
customer_reviews.author: Annapolitan

customer_reviews.title: Folds up surprisingly compact
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with this bench. It's probably 8ft. long when expanded, and folds up into a space not much larger than a reusable grocery bag. The carrying bag that comes with it is larger than it needs to be for sure. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Helpful portable seating
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly helpful purchase for coaching soccer--this helped organize the "bench" and rotation of players in & out of the game. Easy to set-up & put away in the carry case. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emelized

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, Tighten the screws
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3 years ago. It held up pretty good. Until now. Tighten the screws before each season to increase longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Burley

customer_reviews.title: Great for coaches to have at games
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for coaching. We used this all time when we coached. Too many of our games had no where for the kids to sit, except for the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. We ordered several of them for our soccer club. We had some other brands before that we spent more money on. These are about the same quality as the ones we paid $60-80 for.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Works great for soccer team
customer_reviews.text: Works great for soccer team. After a year of use a button has fell off holding material securely to one seat. Easy to set up, take down, and store in sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Great product here you won't go wrong picking this one
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that originally when I made the purchase I was not expecting much. Upon receiving the package today it was overly well packed. Once I opened it I didn't think it was going to be as nice as it is. Functions 100% as described. Most of the other ones I saw were double or triple in price. This thing is great can't wait to put it in use. Thank you again
customer_reviews.author: SWAT

customer_reviews.title: I've used it all season!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my kids soccer team and have used it the entire spring season. It's lightweight, sturdy and easy to set up and break down. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Got 5 of these for our schools cross country team. They are very portable and fold up to the size of a carry on suitcase. They are sturdy enough to hold a bunch of rambunctious kids and usually hould their gear as well. The carrying bags aren't that durable but I wasn't even expecting to receive the bags with the order so they wdre more like a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: K. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Great for sports teams
customer_reviews.text: Bought for soccer team. Glad we did as several places don’t have seating for players. Would have liked to buy the one with backs.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: kids love this
customer_reviews.text: they don't have benches at our field and our kids love having this....
customer_reviews.author: S. White

customer_reviews.title: This is a great price for what it is
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price for what it is. Put some rowdy 12-year-old soccer players on it and there is a chance it will break, but at least it's not too expensive to replace!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Stock

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my soccer team. It’s a bit heavy but durable.
customer_reviews.author: Blackjack

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for our soccer season. The carrier bag is not ideal, but I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Great option
customer_reviews.text: Good quality with case. Works great for our soccer team
customer_reviews.author: cm5768

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the bench.
customer_reviews.text: The team like the bench. We have used it for 6 games and it holds up good.
customer_reviews.author: lian888

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my kid's soccer team
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my kid's soccer team. Only wish that the carrying case had a shoulder strap (for cross body) or backpack style straps.There's a lot of stuff to cart around for soccer games.
customer_reviews.author: jcg

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: They have kept up I bought these about three years ago and used them for soccer games. They are still in really great shape
customer_reviews.author: Nail Biter

customer_reviews.title: Great team bench for youth sports. Folds up easily and is light.
customer_reviews.text: These have been perfect for my sons soccer team. Folds up easily and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Lerma

customer_reviews.title: They absolutely love it. Has stood up to a few seasons ...
customer_reviews.text: This came in very handy for my daughter's soccer team. They absolutely love it. Has stood up to a few seasons so far. Very good product for the price. Have told several different parents where I got it so they could get one also. If you are in need of a multi seat bench you should definitely get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Heith

customer_reviews.title: Great for the whole team
customer_reviews.text: We use it for our U10 soccer team. It’s on its third season and it’s nice to use as the team bench. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: keri

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: use it for soccer for 8U and 10U teams. kids love it. I like it because its lighter than those plastic benches that fold. Setup/breakdown is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for soccer season for a bunch of 8 year olds this year and it was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jthomas

customer_reviews.title: Very portable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 for high school soccer. There lighter then the old aluminum benches. Very portable and easy to use. Sports booster liked the feedback from players ordered 8 more. The 1st four are on their second season without any problems. The price is right even if we need to replace them every few years.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C Cass

customer_reviews.title: Bench harl
customer_reviews.text: Loved these portable benches. Worked GREAT for float setting on parade
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Payne

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Been using consistently for a few months now and as a travel soccer coach this bench is easy to carry and set up. I don't recall my coach pulling out even a chair 30 years ago when I was playing soccer, but I guess times have changed. So far the material is of good quality and have not had any issues. Hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Bench is good, cover/carrier it terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's soccer team. The bench itself is OK and so far has stood up to a group of young boys. The cover however lasted about 10 minutes. The first time I picked it up by the straps, they both tore. Can't use the cover to carry the bench and that makes it awkward to carry. If the cover wasn't garbage making it terribly awkward, I would have given the bench 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bench for my son's soccer team. All the boys love it and it has held up all season long. Easy to transport and comes in a nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for our youth soccer team!
customer_reviews.text: So far we love these! We've used them through an entire fall season of outdoor soccer and haven't had any problems. Since I read that the bad doesn't last long I've been careful with mine and (knock on wood) I haven't had any problems yet. I'll try to update this as we go through more seasons of outdoor soccer.
customer_reviews.author: Terie

customer_reviews.title: Easily set up
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for U12 girls team. Not too heavy, it sets up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse C.

customer_reviews.title: This portable bench has been great for my kids soccer and lax games what a ...
customer_reviews.text: This portable bench has been great for my kids soccer and lax games what a life saver for them. It's easy to carry with carrying bag and easy to setup and take down. Great price as well. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Stylez

customer_reviews.title: Good seating
customer_reviews.text: Football team used it and it worked great for coaches to keep boys in 1 spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The perfect bench for our soccer kids to sit together and watch the team while on the sidelines.
customer_reviews.author: K Ehrhardt

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the U9 girls soccer team that i coach. product functions great, is easy to deploy and after one season it has proved durable with no noticeable wear/tear.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH P MORGAN

customer_reviews.title: Only buy if you are only using for 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the price....only lasted 1 1/2 years before damaged beyond repair. Bag tore out within weeks of using. Within the first season one of the plastic bolts at the corner holding the seat fabric on broke. A year and a half after buying it a tear 3' long happened when a player sat down. Next match 2 more bolts break. I will be buying a new one of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tabs broke within 6 games used
customer_reviews.text: the tabs on the end of the bench broke off, they are plastic and cheap. Teenage girls used the bench and both ends of the bench are not usable. very poor construction, the bag does not fully close. cheap, dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Munson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Bought for my nephew's soccer team. Easy to open and put away. Sturdy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: shopper1212

customer_reviews.title: spring and now summer leagues and still in perfect shape!
customer_reviews.text: made it through fall, spring and now summer leagues and still in perfect shape!
customer_reviews.author: Richard I.

customer_reviews.title: First season use was with U-14 boys and it held up great.
customer_reviews.text: Kicking myself for not buying one of these sooner. I've been a soccer coach for 5 years and finally bought one of these. Don't know why I waited so long. First season use was with U-14 boys and it held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Entrepreneur

customer_reviews.title: Great team bench.
customer_reviews.text: We bought it to use for our family to watch soccer games. The team requested to use it to seat the players when not on the field. They request it every game, so it works well for that.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkins Fan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Second bench since I have been coaching.
customer_reviews.text: Best coach's gift from the team! Not for adults, though. The nylon is tough, but where the nylon meets the grommet has a tendency to tear if six adults try to sit on it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL CANNELLA

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Great bench ! Came in handy a a recent tourney with no benches!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price v
customer_reviews.text: Very strong even the parent have sat on it when we don't have our chairs. The pickets on the side don't get any use but an overall good product
customer_reviews.author: She loves dogs

customer_reviews.title: Best money ever spent for our team!
customer_reviews.text: Best money ever spent for our team! My husband is a coach and we bought one for our players so they had a place to sit during halftime or when subbed out. So much more unity... we LOVE it! Folds up nicely and isn't too heavy either!
customer_reviews.author: cnhay5

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Exactly what we needed for 5 years olds' ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly what we needed for 5 years olds' soccer bench.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for soccer bench
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty and sturdy. Keeps the soccer bench for running around during games.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year olds soccer team... Works Perfectly :)
customer_reviews.author: Angela W.

customer_reviews.title: Best Price and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best prices I have seen for this type of product. It is so easy to fold out and comes with its own carrying case. It is great for any sports team or if you just want to have handy extra seating for your backyard or home. It is sturdy and has held up to little boys being crazy on it! I fully recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: AprilOck

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for our soccer monkeys!
customer_reviews.text: Got this bench for our soccer team. Held our 8 year olds with ease. Very sturdy! As other reviews have stated the bag could be better but for the price this was a great buy. It has survived a full season and I think it will survive at the very least 2 or 3 more. I will update with any deterioration.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Price

customer_reviews.title: watch out for losing small pieces
customer_reviews.text: I like the price and the convenience of having a bench when you need it at worked well the only thing I'm complaining about is the half small knobs to keep the structure in place especially the seating section and occasionally the come loose And if you lose them this bench becomes useless I'm trying to find replacement knobs no luck yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good team bench
customer_reviews.text: Bench is great. The bag is okay--the draw string is worthless, though not really necessary; the straps are back back style which is good, but they don't adjust for length and it feels like they're going to rip from the bag--I suspect I'll be constructing a carrying strap for the bench eventually. It has survived the first season very well though and my U8 team didn't destroy it. Very glad I didn't get the one with the back to it as I suspect that would have been broken because of the boys crawling over the back; this afforded them the ability to land on it from either side.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Used for a 8 year old soccer team. They ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for a 8 year old soccer team. They broke it but we got a whole season out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench, it works great for my sons soccer team. High quality and very light to carry. Well made carry case as well which is rare for these types of products.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Iodice

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer bench for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a very handy U8 Boys Soccer Team. I expect this to last for a few seasons, but it feels sturdy enough. Adults have sit on it, but I would limit it's use for kids up to 13.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy S.

customer_reviews.title: So far it's holding up strong and it's easy to fold away and carry
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for one season for our soccer team. So far it's holding up strong and it's easy to fold away and carry!
customer_reviews.author: M. Voorn

customer_reviews.title: On the bench
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 4th season with this one and it's holding up well. I'm in WA where it rains a lot and it has held up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R Moore Jr

customer_reviews.title: This bench is super cute and very compact
customer_reviews.text: This bench is super cute and very compact. We ordered a few as opposed to having a bunch of rented chairs dropped off for our party.
customer_reviews.author: Michell Houwer

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product! We throw this bench in our wagon ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product! We throw this bench in our wagon every week for my husband's Pop Warner football team. Very durable, heavy duty yet folds up easily and comes with storage bag. Great for coaches or team moms!
customer_reviews.author: Sali French

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench the boys love
customer_reviews.text: Boys soccer team loves this bench. Folds up nice and small. Light weight but quality made.
customer_reviews.author: C kranitz

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Coach!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item as a gift for the coach of my daughter's soccer team. It is fantastic. Folds up perfectly and fits in the soccer wagon.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one month. Sad.
customer_reviews.text: It broke at one of the seat post sites after only one month of light use by 11 year old soccer players.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Folding Bench Is Fine But The Storage Bag Fell Apart Within Two Weeks
customer_reviews.text: The bench itself is fine. However, after two weeks of use, the storage bag almost completely fell apart - it ripped at the seams, the draw string clamp broke and the carrying straps tore away from the bag. While I do not foresee the need to purchase this type of bench in the immediate future, if I did, I would look for another source.
customer_reviews.author: BillTheOldHippy

customer_reviews.title: Nice 6 seater
customer_reviews.text: Nice 6 seater. Wish it had a shade holder. The carry case torn at one end. This need to be sown tougher.
customer_reviews.author: JeanG

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids sports
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I coach my kids' soccer team. It is perfect for the kids to sit on when they are not playing. It packs up nice and stores easily. The only con I have is that it is not comfortable for an adult to sit on unless you have a kid size butt.
customer_reviews.author: Sports mom

customer_reviews.title: The girls love the bench
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my nieces soccer team. The girls love the bench. They can jump up there easy at the age of five. It keeps the team together during the game instead of running around.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good bench for small kids
customer_reviews.text: Our seven year old's soccer team used this all season last year. It is perfect for their light weight bodies. A few adults sat on it at times and I can see the fabric pulling away at the corners from their weight. The bag is useless however and ripped on the first trip from the car to the field. Hopefully we get one more season out of the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M Hawkinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, happy with it. Keeps the kids organized on the side line.
customer_reviews.author: psvan

customer_reviews.title: Love them! They are easy to set up and ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for the kids to sit on at their football games during the game and halftime! Love them! They are easy to set up and come in a carrying case!
customer_reviews.author: ReviewByMe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd grade boys soccer team has used this bench for an entire season, it's holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: SR81

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for our soccer team they sat on it for one game and it broke! Poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Bateman

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: seats broke within a month of using. plastic parts holding seat covers in place broke and are very weak
customer_reviews.author: Jerod P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very quick. The 7 year old soccer team I coach really likes not having to sit on the ground. Even the adult league that I play in was impressed with the quality and the ability to seat 6 adults with no structural give. Great product for the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bench, works perfect for my son's soccer team. Set up and break down couldn't be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packs away easily, and once expanded is extremely sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Packs away easily, and once expanded is extremely sturdy. I expected this, because I purchased it after seeing it and using it at a soccer game. The only thing is that I wish that I had purchased the ones with seat backs. My fault on that, though.
customer_reviews.author: American Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Bench
customer_reviews.text: So far so good for out 6 to 8 year old soccer stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you could want, the girls loved it. Extremely easy to carry from field to field.
customer_reviews.author: EMILY HEBERT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and last us through the fall soccer season without any hiccups.
customer_reviews.author: Bluedge

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench/Value
customer_reviews.text: We have used this bench for this current soccer season for two teams. The bench itself is holding up great. I love having the kids sitting up off the ground. We can put all the balls and bags behind the bench and it encourages the kids on the bench to focus on the game and cheer on their team mates.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa & Rya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and collapse, not very heavy, easy to put back in the carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas M Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Merchandise!!
customer_reviews.text: Coached my son's basketball team and we used it as our bench in a summer outdoor league and where the talk of league!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great portable bench!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought it for my sons soccer team. Great quality. Folds up and can pack up in the bag it came in very easily. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonaMomma

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a solid product - easy to carry to games for the soccer team and store in a carry bag that comes with it. Easy open and close.
customer_reviews.author: DivaGirl

product_meta.title: Trademark Innovations Portable 6 Seater Sports Bench Sits
feature_bullets: Strong, durable, and lightweight portable six-person folding bench
Highly portable and lightweight makes this the ultimate portable bench
Item measures 100 inches long, 18 inches across, and 18 inches high when set up
